apps/server/src/services/agent/executor/.description: New types file containing NewsContext interface with enhanced fields (keyPoints, recommendations, affectedAssets, sentimentTrend), supporting types (NewsRecommendation, AffectedAsset, SentimentTrend), TradeDecision, and ExecutorContext interfaces for agent execution

calculateSentimentTrend method compares average sentiment between current and previous periods (1h/24h). Uses 0.05 threshold for determining direction (improving/declining/stable). Queries newsAnalysis table by analyzedAt timestamp for completed analyses only.

apps/server/src/services/agent/executor..description: executor.service.ts now uses contextBuilderService.getNewsContext(strategy) for enriched news data. Logs "Context built" with hasNews, headlineCount, hasAnalysis, hasTrend. formatNewsContext() includes all enriched fields (keyPoints, recommendations, affectedAssets, sentimentTrend) in agent prompts.
